channel.title: Home on ike
channel.description: Recent content in Home on ike

item.title: 关于
item.description:
I enjoy breakcore and indie music, and my two favorite bands are Radiohead and My Little Airport.
My idols are manateelazycat and Richard Stallman.

I mostly program in Python, and my main device runs NixOS with the KDE desktop environment.
I am currently learning C++ on learncpp.com, and my plan for 2024 is to become a KDE Contributor and improve the touchpad experience on KDE.

I often feel nostalgic about the past.
